alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Camden and Glynn Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Country Club Estates to near Woodbine. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Sea Island, Jekyll Island, Boys Estate and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
